amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to enter into a contract for UH-60 Leak Proof Drip Pans using procedures other than competitive procedures (as defined in section 2302(2) of title 10, United States Code).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to proibit the use of funds to be used to enter into a contract for UH-60 Leak Proof Drip Pans using procedures other than competitive procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Flake.
